description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2ivv5","text":"Quick Protocol for Oligonucleotide Cleanup Using the Monarch® PCR \u0026 DNA Cleanup Kit (5 μg) (NEB #T1030)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":92,"length":10}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"16C02D86FB084F1EAC394951448F5F89","url":"https://www.neb.com/products/t1030-monarch-pcr-dna-cleanup-kit-5-ug#Product%20Information"}}}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"cgqti","text":"DNA Cleanup and Concentration: for the purification of up to   of DNA (ssDNA \u003e 200 nt and dsDNA \u003e 50 bp) from PCR and other enzymatic reactions. A detailed protocol and a quick protocol are available for your convenience. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30},{"style":"bold","offset":54,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":66,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":147,"length":17},{"key":2,"offset":171,"length":14}],"data":{}},{"key":"5g6hp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cr3rh","text":"Oligonucleotide Cleanup (steps): for the purification of up to   of DNA fragments ≥ 15 bp (dsDNA) or ≥ 18 nt (ssDNA). Expected recovery is \u003e 70%. When purifying ssDNA of any size, recovery can be increased by using this protocol; however, it is important to note that this protocol shifts the cutoff for smaller fragments to 18 nt (rather than 50 nt for the DNA Cleanup and Concentration Protocol).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":31},{"style":"bold","offset":57,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":68,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":63,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":358,"length":38}],"data":{}},{"key":"ai8e6","text":"A step-by-step protocol is available here.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":37,"length":4}],"data":{}},{"key":"9cdho","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bk3re","text":"The Monarch PCR \u0026 DNA Cleanup Kit protocol can be modified to enable the purification of ssDNA, oligonucleotides, and other small DNA fragments. The following modified protocol utilizes the same columns and bind/wash/elute workflow of the Monarch PCR \u0026 DNA Cleanup Kit with \u003e 70% recovery and cleanup of oligonucleotides ≥ 15 bp (dsDNA) or ≥18 nt (ssDNA). The Oligonucleotide Cleanup protocol efficiently removes unincorporated nucleotides, short oligos, dyes, enzymes, and salts from labeling and other enzymatic reactions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":6,"offset":4,"length":38}],"data":{}},{"key":"4npac","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dncho","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":7,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"70h64","text":"General Guidelines:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9hq5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9fn9v","text":"Input amount of DNA to be purified should not exceed the binding capacity of the column (5 μg). A starting sample volume of 50 μl is recommended. For smaller samples, nuclease-free water can be used to adjust the volume to the recommended volume range. Centrifugation should be carried out at 16000 x g in a standard laboratory microcentrifuge at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":301,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"0DDA4480A8FA11EA81EA8745C398632F","id":0,"label":"","unit":4}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"FE04EACC1BCE4A0BB2D5AECCA275B65C","url":"https://www.neb.com/protocols/2015/11/23/monarch-pcr-and-dna-cleanup-kit-protocol"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"8E330B08EE554228865354A9A10B30FA","url":"https://www.neb.com/protocols/2015/12/08/quick-protocol-for-monarch-pcr-dna-cleanup-kit-5-g-t1030"}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"141B1130A8FA11EA81EA8745C398632F","id":0,"label":"","unit":4}},"4":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"2262D623CDDA4873B0FAB361AF0806ED","url":"https://www.neb.com/protocols/2015/12/08/quick-protocol-for-monarch-pcr-dna-cleanup-kit-5-g-t1030"}},"5":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"34CD46A0A8FA11EA81EA8745C398632F","url":"https://www.protocols.io/private/C9BC40721E6C420FC92A7F20495889E9"}},"6":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F0344800989A11EC86C00A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.neb.com/protocols/2015/11/23/monarch-pcr-and-dna-cleanup-kit-protocol"}},"7":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1B8003D0989B11ECACCCF19F181328C1","height":426,"id":212953,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gr85bixhp.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gr83bixhp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gr84bixhp.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gr82bixhp.webp","width":550}}}}

For smaller samples, adjust the volume with nuclease-free water. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49voa","text":"Add  . Mix well by pipetting up and down or flicking the tube. Do not vortex.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","guid":"836D7320A8FA11EA81EA8745C398632F","id":0,"label":"ethanol (≥ 95%)","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"df0tu","text":"Insert column into collection tube and load sample onto column and close the cap.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9scrd","text":"Spin at   for  , then discard flow-through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"19vdi","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8sa95","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"16000","duration":0,"guid":"983F5840A8FA11EA81EA8745C398632F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"9A6FF3E0A8FA11EA81EA8745C398632F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4egbn","text":"To save time, spin for 30 seconds, instead of 1 minute.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4dmc7","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bcl09","text":" ","type":"atomic"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"60u05","text":"If using a vacuum manifold** instead of centrifugation, insert the column into the manifold and switch the vacuum on. Allow the solution to pass through the column, then switch the vacuum source off.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"92ufa","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7cm5r","text":"**Make sure to follow the manifold manufacturer's instructions to set-up the manifold and connect it properly to a vacuum source.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"4F16FB16989311EC86C00A58A9FEAC02","height":null,"is_video":false,"mime":null,"original_name":null,"placeholder":"http://input.neb.com/~/media/Catalog/All-Protocols/562D5A8654064DC0AD5C0CE9076A00A6/Content/vacuum.jpg","source":"http://input.neb.com/~/media/Catalog/All-Protocols/562D5A8654064DC0AD5C0CE9076A00A6/Content/vacuum.jpg","width":null},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"imageblock"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"32i2s","text":"Discard flow-through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9fcpr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2do6n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ai0rv","text":" ","type":"atomic"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7sonl","text":"If using a vacuum manifold, add 500 μl of DNA Wash Buffer and switch the vacuum on. {"blocks":[{"key":"9cfvh","text":"Repeat steps 5-7 (Optional).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6d5g","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"580tl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"abkfp","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a30i4","text":"Recommended for removal of enzymes that may interfere with downstream applications (e.g., Proteinase K). ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C6027A0A0D2B4BFCAEF502E4BD44EB6E","id":"2059","label":"Repeating steps 5-7","step_guid":"C75FF20EAB2C4ED78DA2DFAFB0136025","title":"Repeating steps 5-7"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b3dh6","text":"Transfer column to a clean 1.5 ml microfuge tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9u8d","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"erkk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":121}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"k3vv","text":"Use care to ensure that the tip of the column does not come into contact with the flow-through. {"blocks":[{"key":"8n25n","text":"Add ≥   to the center of the matrix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","guid":"EFFC4840A8FA11EA81EA8745C398632F","id":0,"label":"DNA Elution Buffer","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2revh","text":"Wait for  , then spin at   for   to elute DNA. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"410hj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"F99FA0E0A8FA11EA81EA8745C398632F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"16000","duration":0,"guid":"FF9E5B80A8FA11EA81EA8745C398632F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"01EF2950A8FB11EA81EA8745C398632F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":28},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":30}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"33mgu","text":"Typical elution volumes are  – . Nuclease-free water (pH 7–8.5) can also be used to elute the DNA. Yield may slightly increase if a larger volume of DNA Elution Buffer is used, but the DNA will be less concentrated.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e1c3u","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7bc8p","text":"Care should be used to ensure the elution buffer is delivered onto the matrix and not the wall of the column to maximize elution efficiency.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"length":1,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5hen1","text":" ","type":"atomic"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7t70u","text":"To save time, spin for 30 seconds, instead of 1 minute.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"amount":"6","guid":"07170BF0A8FB11EA81EA8745C398632F","id":0,"label":"","unit":1},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"},"1":{"data":{"amount":"20","guid":"08B63D00A8FB11EA81EA8745C398632F","id":0,"label":"","unit":1},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"},"2":{"data":{"guid":"19D0F75C989A11EC86C00A58A9FEAC02","height":null,"is_video":false,"mime":null,"original_name":null,"placeholder":"http://input.neb.com/~/media/Catalog/All-Protocols/562D5A8654064DC0AD5C0CE9076A00A6/Content/clock.jpg","source":"http://input.neb.com/~/media/Catalog/All-Protocols/562D5A8654064DC0AD5C0CE9076A00A6/Content/clock.jpg","width":null},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"imageblock"}}}}}}
